title: An efficient self-driven fog harvesting system based on Kelvin waterdrop generator
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01116C, Paper
Xingsheng Yang, Yunfu Cui, Yingli Li, Hongru Pei, Wanpei Lin, Zhengling Dang, Shenghui Han, Suo Bai, Bo Sun, Li Cheng
As a promising approach to address freshwater scarcity, fog harvesting has attracted increasing attention in recent years. The electric field-assisted fog harvesting method holds significant potential for large-scale application, but...
